prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that loves to roll around in the grass and has a big smile.
Imagine a Pokemon with a long tongue that enjoys eating sweets and has a pink body.
Show me a cute creature that has a round shape and loves to hang out near lakes.
Design a Pokemon that uses its tongue as a weapon in battles and has a joyful demeanor.
Generate a character that looks like a pink blob and is known for its friendly personality.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, often seen near candy shops and playgrounds.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique ability to stretch its tongue far and wide to grab food.
